title: Income Tax Calculator
no-tax-message: With a taxable income of {0}€, you don't pay any tax. You are below the first tax threshold ({1}€).
max-contributor-message: You are a great contributor! You have exceeded the highest tax bracket.
missing-money-complete: You need an additional {0}€ per year ({1}€ per month) to reach the next bracket.
tax-percentage-error: The tax percentage cannot exceed 45 %. Please enter a valid value.
tax-percentage-with-deduction-error: The tax percentage cannot exceed 40.50 % with tax deduction. Please enter a valid value.
tax-percentage-with-fixed-charges-error: The tax percentage cannot exceed 45 % with fixed charges. Please enter a valid value.
no-tax-complete: With a taxable income of {0}€, you don't pay any tax. You are below the second tax threshold (which the limit is at {1}€).
zero-tax-message: With 0% tax, your annual income is less than {0}€ ({1}€/month).
